page.title: 05The Vicar
page.content: Continued In the church there are also two very old pews which were first made in the fifteenth century. they are so fragile that if anyone sat on them they would break. Rev Bell and his wife live in the Vicarage in Middleton. The Vicarage has only been built a few years and is next to the church. The old Vicarage is a lovely old building but it was too big and very expensive to look after so the church had sold it and decided to build a new onewhich is much easier and cheaper to maintain.
